docs.snippet: Players' union head Tony Clark has asked the commissioner's office to investigate comments attributed to unidentified executives in an ESPN.com story estimating what they would offer shortstop Stephen Drew and designated hitter Kendrys Morales, wh...
docs.lead_paragraph: Players' union head Tony Clark has asked the commissioner's office to investigate comments attributed to unidentified executives in an ESPN.com story estimating what they would offer shortstop Stephen Drew and designated hitter Kendrys Morales, who remain free agents.

headline.main: Clark Asks MLB to Probe Comments on Drew, Morales
headline.print_headline: Clark Asks MLB to Probe Comments on Drew, Morales

docs.snippet: J & R, a popular electronics and music store in Lower Manhattan, abruptly shut, at least for now, and the building housing Pearl Paint is for sale....
docs.lead_paragraph: J & R, a popular electronics and music store in Lower Manhattan, abruptly shut, at least for now, and the building housing Pearl Paint is for sale.
docs.abstract: Closing of popular electronics and music store J & R is received by longtime customers as a shock; closing coincides with news that Pearl Paint, art supply store on Canal Street, had put its building up for sale, underscoring change in retail landscape of Lower Manhattan.

headline.seo: J & R and Pearl Paint Reflect Changing Retail Landscape
headline.main: Patrons of 2 Stores Ponder a Loss of Music and Color
